name: Radarr
short_description: Smart PVR for movie collection management and automated downloads.
description: Smart PVR for movie collection management and automated downloads. Radarr is a self-hosted application focused on media, tools, streaming, video. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Radarr on your home server to smart pvr for movie collection management and automated downloads without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Radarr to manage your media workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
